title: How big can luxury resale get in Asia? - Vogue Business
summary: The secondhand market for luxury goods is growing in Asia. The secondhand market has been slower to take off in Asia than in the West due to concerns about counterfeiting, the perception that buying new goods is a status symbol, and the superstition around wearing other people's clothes.
